document_data.mainbody:
The Obsidian Chapel was the temple to Bane, the Lord of Darkness that stood in the desert of Anauroch.
The Obsidian Chapel once held the enchanted Loviatan halberd - the Icon of Power. The weapon was the traditional armament of from the Black Spires of the Maiden, wielded by the temples Whip of Obedience. The halberd was purchased by the Church of Bane from an unnamed thief who stole the weapon and the the Obsidian Chapel kept the halberd out of contempt for the Whips incompetence.
The temple remained unconquered until it was raided and plundered by the Bedine sometime before 1281 DR.
